trends: There have been 12 other sightings in St John
There were no other sightings in St John on or around September 13th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and I will look at the sky once in a while for shooting stars or something different.We saw a lot of things in the sky above our house over the last three years.We live in southern new brunswick.The things we see are unexplainable.So tonight[sept.13 2012]was the latest thing we saw.My son noticed first a big bright star looking object,told me to look.We saw it coming toward us then stopped and soon as i said take a picture or video with your phone,it shot straight up and out of the atmosphere.We've observed weirder things than this.We need someone to come see what we are seeing and maybe help us with recording equipment.
Summary: bright object coming toward us then stopped then shot up out of atmosphere
